definition: promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]

sentences.english: There is a long corridor between east and west yards.
sentences.chinese: 东西跨院问有长廊贯通。

sentences.english: The promenade ends with the stairs leading up to the museum's observation tower.
sentences.chinese: 长廊终止于直通博物馆瞭望塔的楼梯。

sentences.english: The Loggia overlooks the cactus garden and outdoor fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 长廊眺望仙人掌花园和户外壁炉。

sentences.english: The former manufacturing hall now serves as an event hall.
sentences.chinese: 原生产长廊现用为秀场长廊。

sentences.english: The former manufacturing hall now serves as an event hall.
sentences.chinese: 原生产长廊现用为秀场长廊。

sentences.english: The central gallery that runs through the square from north to the south has fountain waterscape.
sentences.chinese: 贯穿广场南北的中央长廊，建有喷泉水景大道。

sentences.english: A low-lying section of the promenade hugging Battery Park was also submerged.
sentences.chinese: 一个低洼的部分，拥抱炮台公园的长廊也被水淹没。

sentences.english: Just outside the Living Room is the Loggia Living Room.
This is a 200-meter-long Gallery of Fairy Tales.
The corridor is interspersed with a quartet of double-eave octagonal pavilions symbolizing each of the four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 这个长廊是八角双重檐，代表着四季的每一个季节。

sentences.english: The Tangbula Grassland is like a long green corridor.
sentences.chinese: 唐布拉草原是绿色的长廊。

sentences.english: The long, seamless corridor frames the stand-alone white bathtub like a sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 无缝长廊框起雕塑般的独立白色浴缸。

sentences.english: The entrance he sought stood at the end of another ground-floor corridor.
sentences.chinese: 他寻找的入口连着另一个底层长廊。

sentences.english: Behind them lies an 18-km long coconut landscaping belt. It is famous both at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 花的那边就是举世闻名的长达18公里的椰梦长廊。

sentences.english: This hallway leads to the emergency exit.
sentences.chinese: 这条长廊通往紧急逃生门。

sentences.english: We started in the gallery forest collecting ants before heading up to the plateau.
sentences.chinese: 我们开始在长廊林里收集蚂蚁，之后才会向高地行进。

definition: winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
